column1: [Highlight] Embiid dunks on Garrison Mathews then grabs his left leg

[Katz] Sources: The Wizards are rescinding Garrison Mathews’ qualifying offer, which will make Mathews an unrestricted free agent. The 24-year-old Mathews shot 38 percent from 3-point range last year and started 24 games as a two-way player.

[Katz] Sources: The Wizards are rescinding Garrison Mathews’ qualifying offer, which will make Mathews an unrestricted free agent. The 24-year-old Mathews shot 38 percent from 3-point range last year and started 24 games as a two-way player.

[Charania] Free agent guard Garrison Mathews is signing a one-year, non-guaranteed deal with the Boston Celtics, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium . Mathews spent his first two NBA seasons with Wizards and played 64 games (24 starts) in 2020-21.
[Highlight] Garrison Mathews hits back-to-back 3s to extend Houston's lead to 17
